channel.title: CVE Feed for fastify -- session
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fastify -- session

item.title: CVE-2024-35220|2024-05-21T20:26:53.312Z -- fastify -- session
item.description: @fastify/session is a session plugin for fastify. Requires the @fastify/cookie plugin. When restoring the cookie from the session store, the `expires` field is overriden if the `maxAge` field was set. This means a cookie is never correctly detected as expired and thus expired sessions are not destroyed. This vulnerability has been patched 10.8.0.
